About Edmodo | How we got started
Everyone's voice is unique. We can't wait to hear yours.
%$1sGet started.%$2s Sign up for an Edmodo account and see first hand how it's changing education. It's free, and always will be.
%$1sGet help.%$2s Have a question, feedback, or an idea you'd like to share? Our dedicated Support team is ready and available, 24/7.
%$1sGet a job.%$2s If you're looking to make a difference, we're always looking for great talent. Check out our culture and open positions.
%$1sGet connected.%$2s Want to build your social learning network? Join our worldwide community of collaboration.

"We're moving to a world where you can look at specific experiences and specific students and understand what's working for particular types of learners. Empowering teachers is the only path to getting better outcomes."
– Nic Borg, Co-Founder and Chief Product Officer
Knowledge is more than facts and figures. We help transform it into opportunities.

Founded in Chicago, Illinois, when two school district employees set out to bridge the gap between how students live their lives and how they learn in school, Edmodo was created to bring education into a 21st century environment.

Today, Edmodo is based in San Mateo, California. Thanks to those who guided and supported us in the beginning, we're now the number one primary and secondary social learning network in the world, dedicated to connecting all learners with the people and resources they need to reach their full potential.
Become part of the world's largest primary and secondary social learning community where teachers, students, and parents can connect safely and securely.
Communities are made up of individuals. We'd like you to meet our Edmodians.
Every day, you're on the front lines, dedicated to making a difference. Meet the people behind the scenes, dedicated to supporting you every step of the way.
Technology is creating a whole new set of rules. We believe some principles should never change.

%$1sWe're just getting started.%$2s Creating connections is just the beginning; we want to do more than just make an impact on outcomes. We want to empower learners, on our network and around the world.

%$1sWe're all in this together.%$2s Everything we do makes an impact on everyone on our team and inside every classroom. So we make sure we're reliable, collaborative, and armed with the best intentions.
%$1sWe thrive on feedback.%$2s Whether we're doing well, or can do better, we like to know where we stand. It helps us identify and learn from each lesson, and celebrate every success.
%$1sWe're obsessed with educators.%$2s Because teachers helped us realise our full potential, we try to emulate them in everything we do. We think critically, listen patiently, and speak openly.
%$1sWe love learning.%$2s No matter how much we know, there's always room to grow. To create opportunities for success, we develop tools that personalise learning and encourage growth.
%$1sWe believe less is more.%$2s And thrive on doing more with less. We're resourceful enough to be creative, and honest enough to keep things straightforward and reliable.

Because Edmodo is used by teachers and students, we hold ourselves to very high standards. Our values not only define our company culture; they characterise the product features trusted in classrooms around the world.
How students learn is just as important as what. Edmodo is where education meets innovation.
Easily deploy and manage digital assets, track usage patterns and student progress on your school dashboard.

Edmodo Sync relieves the burden of manual account provisioning and deprovisioning while also eliminating data errors. This way learning tools, users, and groups can be easily added or removed with minimal effort. The only question left is what to do with all that extra time.

Edmodo Sync makes it easy to activate and engage professional learning communities. From onboarding new teachers to supporting school leaders, you can adapt PLCs to meet your needs. Even non-instructional staff will experience easier resource sharing and simplified communication, so everyone benefits.
Now it’s easier than ever to bring your entire school onboard. With Edmodo Sync, group creation and registering is automated, and you’ll have full oversight and support every step of the way.

Edmodo Sync helps you synchronize your registers quickly and easily. With either credentials-based or SFTP, we help keep all your information up to date. Plus, you can set up a secure, encrypted Single Sign-On to help your teachers stop wasting time with multiple student logins.
Ready to start saving time and money?
More time for teaching, less time managing technology.
Designed to simplify integration and rollout, Edmodo Sync securely updates credentials on a daily basis.

"Edmodo was created by two IT engineers who know the importance of keeping all stakeholders safe in the virtual world –that's why they developed such an inclusive platform where parents and administrators are involved. I have total control of my classroom so I can keep my students protected. It really has transformed the way I teach."

Edmodo was founded six years ago to provide primary and secondary teachers, school officials, students, and parents with a closed, private learning network that they could use to connect and collaborate with each other. Today, educators, students, and parents from around the world have signed up to use Edmodo as their preferred learning platform. One key reason: our longstanding commitment to user privacy.

Founded in Chicago, Illinois, when two school district employees set out to bridge the gap between how students live their lives and how they learn in school, Edmodo was created to bring education into a 21st century environment.

A free and safe way for students and teachers to connect
and collaborate.
Edmodo provides free classroom communication for teachers, students and administrators on a secure social network.

Free features for schools are currently available for primary and secondary public, nonprofit, private and charter schools based in
the US, Australia, UK or Canada. For questions regarding eligibility please email %1$s

Groups are an easy way to communicate with both students and colleagues. Create digital classrooms for your students where you can share educational content, create assignments and more! Whether from the school or district or a shared common interest, groups makes it easy to communicate with other educators!
Groups provide a number of ways to assign coursework to your students. You can send individual assignments and quizzes, as well as share educational content through messages, all in one secure place!

Groups make it easy share ideas, answer students' questions, and assign quizzes and coursework. Adding students to your group is easy, just share your group code with your students and within a few minutes your digital classroom will be all set!

Your Edmodo group provides an easy way to communicate and share content and ideas with your fellow colleagues. Simply have them join using your group code and start communicating on our secure platform.

Before a student can create an Edmodo account, they will need a 6-digit group code from their teacher. Once they have their group code, they can visit Edmodo.com and select the "I’m a student" button. From here they can enter the group code provided by their teacher, complete the registration form and select "Sign up".
Note: Students are not required to enter an email address to create an Edmodo account.

"Safety is of utmost importance for administrators in modern schools, and Edmodo is doubtless one of the safest internet learning platforms available. It's no wonder other schools are raving about its features and capabilities for both inter- and intra-school communication and collaboration. In my own distance-learning projects through Edmodo, my students have enjoyed collaborating with students at great distances and I've felt secure that they were safe from online intrusions. If that had not been the case, I would never have committed to an online learning setting."

Started in September 2008 and officially launched in September 2009, Edmodo is a social learning network for teachers, students and schools on the Web. Teachers and students worldwide use Edmodo every day to connect and collaborate in a secure, fun environment. Our free network offers a safe and easy way to post classroom materials, share helpful links and videos, and access homework, marks and school-wide notices.

Whether you're new to Edmodo or want to get to know it better, we have a team dedicated to your success. From our Help Centre, where you can learn more about our features and account types, to our Support Community, where you can ask direct questions, it's easy to get (or give) Edmodo tech expertise in an instant.
Need ideas for GCSEs? Just ask; our global community of educators will share resources in minutes. No matter what your key stage and subject area, we've got you covered.

With intuitive features, unlimited storage and the ability to create groups, assign homework, set quizzes, manage progress and much more all on one platform – Edmodo reinforces and enhances what you're already doing in the classroom.

Give students new ways to engage, participate, and express themselves. With Edmodo, you can post discussion topics, conduct polls, award badges, and more, to foster communication and make learning social.

Edmodo is designed to give you complete control over your digital classroom. With tools that let you determine who can join groups, ensure they remain private, and monitor member activity, safety is built right in.

Whether you want to create a paperless classroom, nurture digital citizenship skills, integrate educational content into your teaching, or grow your professional learning network, you can personalise how you use Edmodo.
